content: k3 yo k6 yo k3 ssk k to end of round page 2 of 5 splitting for chest and back starting at the round marker round 1 k one round round 2 rm k 15 16 17 18 19 20 22 bobble 4 4 6 6 6 8 8 k 7 8 7 8 9 8 10 for sizes 0-­ 6 do p4 k8 p4 for sizes 12-­ 18 do p5 k10 p5 for sizes 2t-­ 4 do p6 k12 p6 k 7 8 7 8 9 8 10 slip off all sts between here and the bind off this will become the front of the vest bobble 4 4 6 6 6 8 8 k 30 32 34 36 38 40 44 30 32 34 36 38 40 44 back sts remain back when all four straps are finished seam the straps row 1 ws purl together row 2 ssk k to 2 sts before the end k2tog the neck and arm ribbing will have to be worked in the repeat row 1-­ 2 once more round 26 28 30 32 34 36 40 back sts remain left shoulder row 1-­ 4 starting on a rs work stockinette for 4 work st st until back measures 8 8 5 10 12 15 17 row 20 inches from cast on edge last row knit should be row 5 rs size 0m-­ 18m k1 yo k2tog k 0 or more a ws sts to 3 sts before end of row k2tog yo k1 size 2t-­ 4 k2 yo k2tog k to 4 sts before split for shoulder straps end of row k2tog yo k2 with rs facing k 6 6 7 7 8 9 9 and slip to scrap row 6 purl all sts yarn bobble 14 16 16 18 18 18 22 sts k 6 6 7 7 row 7 bind off 8 9 9 right shoulder to make a seamless vest do not bind off the back slip the other shoulder s sts onto needles join yarn shoulder straps but instead slip them to scrap yarn and repeat left shoulder instructions row 1-­ 7 when doing the front straps omit buttonhole instructions and again do not bind off the straps page 3 of 5 front sizes 12-­ 18m sizes 2t-­ 4 slip the first 15 16 17 18 19 20 row 1 rs ssk k 6 7 p5 k5 row 1 ssk rs k 6 8 p6 k6 22 sts to needles row 2 ws p5 k5 p 7 8 row 2 ws p6 k6 p 7 9 join yarn and begin knitting row 3 ssk k 5 6 p4 k2tog k4 row 3 ssk k 5 7 p5 k2tog k5 row 4 p5 k4 p 6 7 row 4 p6 k5 p 6 8 sizes newborn-­ 6m row 5 k 6 7 p3 k2tog k4 row 5 k 6 8 p4 k2tog k5 row 1 rs ssk k5 6 7 p4 k4 row 6 p5 k3 p 6
